original_text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.
korean_text: 자기의 육체를 위하여 심는 자는 육체로부터 썩어질 것을 거두고 성령을 위하여 심는 자는 성령으로부터 영생을 거두리라

sentences.original_text: For he that soweth to his flesh
shall of the flesh reap corruption
but he that soweth to the Spirit
shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting
